description:
Steve & Alex from the Minecraft™ game are coming to the Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate game as a new playable fighter! This iconic fighter is the second fighter in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass Vol 2 DLC. Use Steve and Alex’s various tools to mine and craft your way to victory! Challenger Pack 7 also includes a new stage

Note: The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass Vol. 2 (sold separately).
name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 7
